alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 15 at 9:05PM MST until August 15 at 11:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM MST/1230 AM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR LABYRINTH CANYON ON LAKE POWELL... At 859 PM MST /959 PM MDT/, Thunderstorms have moved out of the area, but the threat of flash flooding in Labyrinth Canyon will continue until 1130 PM MST/1230 AM MDT. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of slot canyons, creeks, normally dry washes. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Labyrinth Canyon and surrounding areas of the Glen Canyon National Recreation Area (Lake Powell). This includes the following slot canyons... Labyrinth Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Those near the Labyrinth slot canyon should seek higher ground immediately. Those camping nearby should be prepared for rapidly changing conditions in the aftermath of the storm.
